summary: This is an email chain between attorneys Daniel J. Kaiser and Kimberly Lerner, with an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York, regarding scheduling a call about the Epstein case. It references a prior meeting and coordination among legal teams.

keyFacts: The email chain shows coordination between defense attorneys and federal prosecutors in the SDNY Epstein case in July 2019.
It references a prior meeting that occurred, indicating ongoing legal discussions about the case.
The correspondence is professional and focused on scheduling, showing formal communication channels between legal teams.
